official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of the first Friday of March of each year as "Teacher Day, U.S.A.".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the first Friday in March of each year as "Teacher Day, U.S.A."

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of the first Friday of March of each year as "Teacher Day, U.S.A.".
